findings.title: #1 Reentrancy in MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability in MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw function: pool.lpToken.safeTransfer(address(msg.sender),user.amount) and user.amount = 0, user.rewardDebt = 0

findings.title: #2 Reentrancy in MasterChef.deposit
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability in MasterChef.deposit function allowing potential attacks.

findings.title: Potential use of block.number as source of randomness
findings.description: The values of variables like coinbase, gaslimit, block number and timestamp are predictable and can be manipulated by a malicious miner. Don't use any of those environment variables as sources of randomness and be aware that use of these variables introduces a certain level of trust into miners.
